questions.question: What is Python?
options: Both a programming and a scripting language
questions.answer: Both a programming and a scripting language

questions.question: What is the main use of Python?
What is a module in Python?
What is a list in Python?
options: An ordered collection of elements of any type
questions.answer: An ordered collection of elements of any type

questions.question: What is a for loop in Python?
options: A loop that executes a block of code multiple times
A loop that executes a block of code until a condition is met
A loop that executes a block of code for each element in a sequence
questions.answer: A loop that executes a block of code for each element in a sequence

questions.question: What is a lambda function in Python?
options: A function that is defined in one line of code
A function that takes a variable number of arguments
A function that returns a generator
questions.answer: A function that is defined in one line of code

questions.question: What is object-oriented programming?
options: A programming paradigm that uses objects and classes to structure code
A programming paradigm that only uses functions
A programming paradigm that only uses variables
questions.answer: A programming paradigm that uses objects and classes to structure code

questions.question: What is a class in Python?
options: A data type that stores data in key-value pairs
A function that returns multiple values

questions.question: What is inheritance in object-oriented programming?
options: A way to reuse code from existing classes
A way to create new classes from existing classes
A way to define variables in a class
questions.answer: A way to create new classes from existing classes

questions.question: What is pip?
options: A script that automatically installs packages
A Python library that installs packages
